what: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Test data (SDTM) pharmaverse family packages Purpose Installation Data Sources Naming Conventions Update Documentation Process

title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: provide one-stop-shop SDTM test data pharmaverse family packages. includes datasets therapeutic area (TA)-agnostic (DM, VS, EG, etc.) well TA-specific ones (RS, TR, OE, etc.).

title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: package available CRAN can installed running install.packages("pharmaversesdtm"). install latest development version package directly GitHub use following code:
code: if (!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)) {   install.packages("remotes") }  remotes::install_github("pharmaverse/pharmaversesdtm", ref = "main") # This command installs the latest development version directly from GitHub.

title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: test datasets sourced CDISC pilot project, datasets constructed ad-hoc {admiral} team. Please check Reference page detailed information regarding source specific datasets.

title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Datasets TA-agnostic: SDTM domain name (e.g., dm, rs). Datasets TA-specific: domain_TA_others, others go broader categories specific ones (e.g., oe_ophtha, rs_onco, rs_onco_irecist). Note: SDTM domain used multiple TAs, pharmaversesdtm may provide multiple versions corresponding test dataset. instance, package contains ex ex_ophtha latter contains ophthalmology-specific variables EXLAT EXLOC, EXROUTE exchanged plausible ophthalmology value.

title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Firstly, make GitHub issue {pharmaversesdtm} planned updates tag @pharmaverse/admiral one development core team can sanity check request. two main ways extend test data: either adding new datasets extending existing datasets new records/variables. Whichever method choose, worth noting following: Programs generate test data stored data-raw/ folder. programs written standalone R script: packages need loaded given program, call library() start program (please call library(pharmaversesdtm)). created program data-raw/ folder, need run standalone R script, order generate test dataset become part pharmaversesdtm package, need build package. Following best practice, dataset stored .rda file whose name consistent name dataset, e.g., dataset xx stored xx.rda. easiest way achieve use usethis::use_data(xx) programs data-raw/ stored within pharmaversesdtm GitHub repository, part pharmaversesdtm package–data-raw/ folder specified .Rbuildignore. run program data-raw/ folder, generate dataset written data/ folder, become part pharmaversesdtm package. names sources test datasets specified R/*.R, purpose generating documentation man/ folder. Note: documentation process pharmaversesdtm automated consistency ease maintenance. Metadata dataset, names, labels, descriptions, authors, sources, managed centralized JSON file (inst/extdata/sdtms-specs.json) used generate .R documentation files. See Documentation Process details.

title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Use CDISC pilot data dm input program order create realistic synthetic data remains consistent domains (mandatory). Note personal data used part package, even anonymized. Run program. Reflect update adding relevant information inst/extdata/sdtms-specs.json file. Run data-raw/create_sdtms_data.R order update NAMESPACE update .Rd files man/. Add GitHub handle .github/CODEOWNERS. Update NEWS.md.

title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Locate existing program <name>.R data-raw/ folder, update accordingly. Reflect update adding relevant information inst/extdata/sdtms-specs.json file. Run program, output updated <name>.rda data/ folder. Run data-raw/create_sdtms_data.R order update NAMESPACE update .Rd files man/. Add GitHub handle .github/CODEOWNERS. Update NEWS.md.

title: SDTM Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: documentation process pharmaversesdtm automated consistency ease maintenance. Metadata dataset, names, labels, descriptions, authors, sources, managed centralized JSON file (inst/extdata/sdtms-specs.json) used generate .R documentation files. streamlined approach aligns best practices efficient package development.

title: pharmaversesdtm: SDTM Test Data for the 'Pharmaverse' Family of Packages — pharmaversesdtm-package
text: set Study Data Tabulation Model (SDTM) datasets Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) pilot project used testing developing Analysis Data Model (ADaM) datasets inside pharmaverse family packages. SDTM dataset specifications described CDISC SDTM implementation guide, accessible creating free account https://www.cdisc.org/.

title: pharmaversesdtm 1.2.0
